price: [Y se les dirá:] "Esta es la recompensa. Su esfuerzo ha sido aceptado [por Dios]".
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَكَانَ سَعۡيُكُم مَّشۡكُورًا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā kāna lakum jazāan wakāna saʿyukum mashkūran
